title: Crypt of the NecroDancer (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
1. Run "setup_crypt_of_the_necrodancer_2.0.0.1"
2. Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: CRYPT OF THE NECRODANCER
Genre: Role-playing - Turn-based - Roguelike
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player - Co-op
Released: April 23, 2015
Size: 1.5 GB
Company: Brace Yourself Games / Brace Yourself Games
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/crypt_of_the_necrodancer

About:
Crypt of the NecroDancer is an award winning hardcore roguelike rhythm game. Move to the music and deliver beatdowns to the beat! Groove to the epic Danny Baranowsky soundtrack, or select songs from your own MP3 collection!
A roguelike rhythm game! Move on the beat to navigate ever changing dungeons
Groove to the award winning Danny Baranowsky soundtrack, or play with any MP3 from your collection!
Play with keyboard, controller, or even USB dance pad
BONUS: Includes 2 playable remixes of the entire soundtrack. A metal remix by FamilyJules7X and an EDM remix by A_Rival!

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8
Processor: 2GHz 
Memory: 1000 MB RAM 
Graphics: 512MB VRAM 
Hard Drive: 1600 MB available space
